content: Causes of Variation in Credit-Market Sentiment  • A combination of easy monetary policy and reach-for-yield may lead to  downward pressure on credit-risk and term premiums.  • If so, accommodative monetary policy may involve an intertemporal  tradeoff:  • Stimulates economy today but reduces growth later on.
